attributes.action: Tell the Ukrainian people that by joining the EU they move from a system of national corruption to international corruption.
attributes.additional_details: The Ukrainian people are being led like lambs to the slaughter.  The levels of corruption of their own politicians pales into insignificance when compared with the levels if corruption among politicians in the EU hierarchy.  They do not realise that they are increasing, exponentially, the number of politicians they will have to service with unrestricted personal self enrichment when they join the EU.  SOMEBODY NEEDS TO TELL THEM, BEFORE IT IS TOO LATE.
